description:
Arisa is the daughter of the Takanomiya family who looked after http://anidb.net/ch45096 [Akito] while he was in Kyoto. She`s 12 years old and she`s been appointed as the manager of St. Liliana Academy`s dorm. She`s a super elementary schooler with excellent grades, great skill at housework, and the ability to read others and be considerate. However, she still acts like the kid she is when Akito`s involved.
Source: ANN
name: Takanomiya Arisa
